Key Match Events: The Detroit Pistons secured a 118-115 victory over the Portland Trail Blazers.
The Pistons advanced to an 18-18 record and achieved their fourth consecutive win.
For the first time since 2018, the Pistons are .500 in January.
Pre-Game Insights: Heading into the matchup, the Pistons had three wins in a row with a 17-18 record.
Post-Match Reflections: Cade Cunningham expressed pride in the team's effort, stating, 'I appreciate it a lot. It’s taken a lot of work from everybody. So, to be at this point right now, it feels good. A lot of games left, but this is a huge moment for us. I think it’s only something we can build on.'
